directions.from_staircase: After reaching second floor, turn left to enter S wing. S201 is the first room on your right.
directions.to_s202: Exit S201 and continue straight. S202 is the next room.

directions.from_s201: Exit S201 and continue straight. S202 is the next room.
directions.to_toilets: Exit S202 and turn right. Gents toilet (S203) is on the left and Ladies toilet (S204) is on the right.

directions.from_s202: Exit S202 and turn right. S203 is on your left.
Exit S202 and turn right. S204 is on your right.

directions.from_toilets: From the toilets, continue straight. S205 is the next lab.

directions.from_s205: Exit S205 and continue straight. S206 is the next lab.

directions.from_s206: Exit S206 and continue straight. S207 is the next room.

directions.from_s207: Exit S207 and continue straight. S208 is the next lab.

directions.from_s208: Exit S208 and continue straight. S209 is the next lab.

directions.from_s209: Exit S209 and continue straight. S210 is at the end of the corridor.

general_directions.s_to_r: Exit S wing and turn right to enter R wing
general_directions.r_to_p: Exit R wing and continue straight to enter P wing
general_directions.p_to_t: Exit P wing and turn right to enter T wing
general_directions.t_to_j: Exit T wing and continue straight to enter J wing
general_directions.j_to_o: Exit J wing and turn left to enter O wing
